value.title: Tools to take Power BI to the NEXT LEVEL

value.title: Use Azure SQL Managed Instance Link to have a Read Replica in the cloud!
value.excerpt: Want to leverage the power of the cloud with your on-prem SQL Server? Azure SQL Managed Instance may be the answer for you! Dani joins us to talk about why MI Link can help bridge the two.
